cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 2nd Nov 2025 (AEST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 2nd Nov 2025 (AEST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: Standard 4 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Meet people while experiencing the luxury of Abode at a lower price. Each room comes with 2 bunks beds, aircon/heating and shared bathroom. All guests have their own personal reading light, power point and locker. Linen and blankets provided.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: Deluxe 4 Bed Female Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Female dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer female accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Highly recommended for travellers looking to make friends while enjoying all the mod cons including air-con, en-suite bathroom. All guests have their own personal reading light, power point and locker. All linen and blankets provided.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
A great option for single travellers or couples looking to experience our delightful accomodation at a fraction of the cost. Our room comes with comfy queen bed, aircon/heating and shared bathroom. All
Linen and towels provided.
